message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Let me know if you can meet me at $75.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand you're on a budget. I can't go as low as $75, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $82.50. This is a great price for a product worth $80 to you, and it's the best I can do. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $82.50 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $78 for the product. Let me know if you can work with that.
